label: cascading_failure_01_ep_017
content:
## 2024-01-31 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /checkout: REQUESTS 142600 | p50: 165ms p95: 440ms p99: 820ms | err: 1.82% (2600 errors) | success: 98.18%
- /fraud_check: REQUESTS 142100 | p50: 115ms p95: 330ms p99: 560ms | err: 0.37% (520 errors) | success: 99.63%
- /geo_lookup: REQUESTS 139800 | p50: 210ms p95: 460ms p99: 620ms | err: 0.21% (290 errors) | success: 99.79%
- /auth: REQUESTS 185900 | p50: 38ms p95: 100ms p99: 175ms | err: 0.1% (180 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /product_catalog: REQUESTS 249800 | p50: 47ms p95: 140ms p99: 250ms | err: 0.1% (240 errors) | success: 99.9%
- /search: REQUESTS 216400 | p50: 68ms p95: 180ms p99: 310ms | err: 0.16% (340 errors) | success: 99.84%
- /recommendations: REQUESTS 175100 | p50: 82ms p95: 230ms p99: 395ms | err: 0.19% (330 errors) | success: 99.81%

### Infrastructure
- gateway-01: CPU 64% | Mem 75% | Disk 62% | Conns: 4050 | Net: 610/730 Mbps
- gateway-02: CPU 61% | Mem 73% | Disk 61% | Conns: 3890 | Net: 592/710 Mbps
- service-b-01: CPU 63% | Mem 72% | Disk 59% | Conns: 3320 | Net: 480/565 Mbps
- metrics-db-01: CPU 38% | Mem 75% | Disk 84% | Conns: 320 | Net: 150/182 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- primary: active 198 | idle 2 | waiting 110 | exhaustion: 9 | max: 200 | avg_wait: 110ms
- replica: active 95 | idle 5 | waiting 16 | exhaustion: 2 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 18ms
- third_party_geo: active 60 | idle 0 | waiting 68 | exhaustion: 12 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 145ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 92.6% | Bandwidth: 8.1 Gbps | Origin requests: 412800

### Alerts
- [CRITICAL] CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION on gateway-02: pool=third_party_geo events=12 waiting=68
- [CRITICAL] CHECKOUT-ERROR-RATE on gateway-01: error_pct=1.82
- [CRITICAL] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=310 retry_rate_pct=0.26

### Deployments & Changes
- Config change: service-B retry max_attempts set to 4

### Events
- Updated service-B retry max_attempts from 5 to 4
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Enabled gateway upstream keepalive for geo vendor host
- Scaled service-B from 7 to 9 instances

### On-Call
- Shift: R. Alvarez. 8 pages (CONNPOOL-EXHAUSTION, SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT). 3 tickets (SRV-B-241 retry config, POOL-559, CO-798). Status: Mitigating.
